tool_description: Checks images for various types of corruption, file integrity issues, and readability problems that could interfere with annotation workflows.

image_paths.description: List of image file paths to check for corruption

check_types.description: Types of corruption checks to perform

repair_mode.description: Whether to attempt automatic repair of minor corruption

error_messages: Invalid image path: One or more image paths do not exist or are not accessible.
Invalid check types: check_types must contain values from [file_integrity, header_validity, pixel_data, format_compliance].
File access error: Unable to read or access image file for corruption checking.
Memory error: Insufficient memory to perform corruption check on large image file.
usage: Provide image_paths array. Optionally specify check_types to focus on specific corruption types and enable repair_mode for automatic fixes. Tool checks each image for corruption issues.

corrupted_images.description: List of image paths that are corrupted

healthy_images.description: List of image paths that passed all corruption checks

corruption_details.description: Array of JSON-formatted corruption details for each problematic image

repaired_images.description: List of images that were successfully repaired

corruption_rate.description: Percentage of images found to be corrupted
